text: Yolanda Montes (January 3, 1932 – February 16, 2025), better known by her stage-name Tongolele, was a Mexican–American dancer, actress and vedette. She was one of the last surviving stars from the Golden Age of Mexican Cinema. Montes was born in Spokane, Washington. Her first movie role was in the 1948 movie Nocturne of Love. Montes died on February 16, 2025 in Puebla, Mexico at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican dancers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Actors from Spokane, Washington
title: Yolanda Montes
